title: I Am Weak but Thou Art Strong

author.name: Anonymous
author.bio: This hymn is a traditional gospel song, with origins that are difficult to trace. It has been a beloved part of Christian hymnody for many years, known for its heartfelt plea for a closer walk with Jesus.

lyrics:
1 I am weak but Thou art strong
Jesus keep me from all wrong:
I’ll be satisfied as long,
As I walk let me walk
Close to Thee

Chorus:
Just a closer walk with Thee,
Grant it, Jesus is my plea;
Daily walking close to Thee,
Let it be, dear Lord,
Let it be

2 Thru this world of toil and snares,
If I falter, Lord, who cares?
Who with me my burden shares?
None but Thee, dear Lord,
None but Thee.

3 When my feeble life is o’er,
Time for me will be no more;
Guide me gently, safely o’er,
To Thy Kingdom shore,
To Thy shore
